product_overview: Community Car MVC is a premium, feature-rich online platform designed for car enthusiasts to connect, share, and explore their automotive interests through engaging community features, real-time communication, and AI-powered assistance. It supports localization with full RTL capabilities for Arabic users.
core_goals: Provide a comprehensive social platform tailored to car enthusiasts for sharing knowledge and experiences.
Enable seamless real-time communication and interaction among community members via instant messaging and notifications.
Offer localized content and user interface supporting English and Arabic to serve a global user base.
Integrate advanced AI assistance to enhance user engagement and support through a responsive, interactive chat widget.
Facilitate discovery of car-friendly locations and events through mapping and group features.
Maintain an efficient and intuitive admin dashboard for managing content, settings, and localization dynamically.
key_features: Community Q&A system enabling users to ask and answer car-related questions with real-time updates.
Feeds and Stories for sharing posts and temporary content within the community.
Groups and Events creation and participation to foster local meetups and enthusiast collaborations.
Maps and Points of Interest highlighting car-friendly locations and tracks with RTL support.
Real-time messaging and notifications powered by SignalR enabling private chats and instant interactions.
AI Assistant integrated via Google Gemini and Hugging Face APIs featuring a glassmorphism-designed interactive chat widget.
Full localization support including English and Arabic with dynamic translation management via admin dashboard.
Account management including user registration, login, and profile management.
user_flow_summary: Users register and login to create and manage their profiles.
Users explore the community by browsing Q&A, feeds, stories, groups, and events.
Users participate by posting questions, answers, feeds, and stories, and join groups or events.
Users interact in real-time through private chats and receive notifications.
Users discover car-friendly locations on interactive maps with support for RTL languages.
Users engage with the AI assistant for help or information via a responsive chat widget.
Admins access the dashboard to manage site content, user activities, and translations.
All interactions are localized based on user language preference ensuring seamless global usage.
validation_criteria: All community features demonstrate real-time updates and user interactions without significant delay.
AI assistant responds accurately and maintains responsiveness on various devices.
Localization properly switches between English and Arabic, including correct RTL layout.
SignalR-based real-time messaging and notifications are reliable and instant.
Admin dashboard allows full management of content, settings, and dynamic translations.
User registration, login, and profile management function correctly with secure authentication.
Map features display correctly with localized points of interest and navigational aids.
